meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Marion Montgomery Tyler Johnson Lisa Schlitt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7460.

td.p: Marion Montgomery, a library assistant from Huntsville, Alabama
Tyler Johnson, a political science professor from Oklahoma City, Oklahoma
Lisa Schlitt, a microbiologist from Berwyn, Pennsylvania (whose 5-day cash winnings total $112,300)

tr.td: THE JEOPARDY! SORTING HAT
AMERICAN HISTORY
NUMERICAL PHRASES
(Alex: We'll give you the shows, you give us the city in which they were mainly set in the category...)
TELEVISION CITY
Q PEOPLE
THE END OF THE STORY

the judicial branch

TylerMarion
')
